title: parama puruSa nanu
sahitya:
parama puruSa nanu karma samastam bhavati samarpayAmi


anupallavi

  parayA tava mAyayA bata mOhitO api


caraNam 1    yadiha nishamayAmiyadavalOkayAmi yadapi ca jighrAmi yadapi dadAmi
    caraNam 2    yadahamashramIva yadatha vadAmi yadanu sprshamIsha yadapi dadhAmi
    caraNam 3    viditam aviditam va vihitam avihitam tadapi pankajanAbha tava sEvakO aham
